name: Traffic Car Racing Shooter 3D
description:
Ultimate car war is going on between death riders in ultimate death race competition even in the presence of traffic. Drive your fast and furious car in the dangerous and impossible tracks and shoot.Destroy all of the heavy loaded vehicles and moto racing cars from the route.There are wildest action sequences as cars are engaged in a chase battle all across the highway.
Get yourself ready to experience the realistic version of furious death racing with advanced features and action gameplay. With extreme and fast paced race it is challenge for you to shoot and destroy the all enemy racing rivals with heavy lethal weapons.

Features:
>A mesmerizing blend of war and race
>Engaging, Exciting and interactive simulation
>Realistic graphics and gameplay
>Best traffic racer car physics
>High quality traffic cars with left and right movement
